title: URF with Items New Game Mode (kind of)
body: Recently I been thinking if league can have a URF kind of game mode where every items' unique passive become no longer unique which means players can stack up certain items passive and just go CRAZY! For instance back in the time when Black Cleaver's Cleaving effect was not unique, quite a few bruiser champs could just have four of these and nothing gonna stop them. I know how ridiculous this situation may sounds like but I'm sure there's way to balance this. Maybe everyone entering the mode can only choose one item for the entire game and nothing else as soon as the game starts, maybe even before it starts so nobody can counter other players. Also the effect of Black Cleaver's effect is going to be pretty OP but things like Thornmail can easily counter it. It would be fantastic to see Riot try to bring this into the game because this mode is not about balance but all about FUN!
